ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.2_0: the nun Caṇḍakāḷī was mixing with a householder and their child.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.3_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.4_0: “How can Venerable Caṇḍakāḷī socialize with a householder and their child?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī does this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.8_0: “... How can the nun Caṇḍakāḷī do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.10_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.11.1_0: ‘If a nun is socializing with a householder or a householder’s child, the nuns should correct her like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.12_0: “Venerable, don’t socialize with householders or householders’ children.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.12_2: The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.13_0: If that nun is acting like this, she should press her up to three times to make her stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.14_0: If she then stops, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.14_1: If he does not, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.6_0: Don’t rely on bodily and verbal action?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.10_0: whoever is a child or a sibling.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.14_0: Other nuns should correct her like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.15_0: “Venerable, don’t socialize with householders or householders’ children.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.17_0: The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.18_0: They should correct them a second
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.20_0: If she stops, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.21_0: If he does not stop, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.22_0: If those who heard about it do not say anything, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.23_0: That nun, even if she has to be pulled into the middle of the Sangha, should be corrected like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.24_0: “Venerable, don’t socialize with householders or householders’ children.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.26_0: The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.27_0: They should correct them a second
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.29_0: If she stops, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.30_0: If he does not stop, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.32_0: “And, monks, they should be pressed like this.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.33_0: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.34_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.35_0: The nun so-and-so is socializing with householders and householders’ children.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.36_0: And she keeps on doing it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.37_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should press her to make her stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.39_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.40_0: The nun so-and-so is socializing with householders and householders’ children.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.41_0: And she keeps on doing it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.42_0: The Sangha presses her to make her stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.43_0: Any nun who approves of pressing them to make them stop should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.44_0: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.46_0: For the third time I speak on this matter. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.47_0: The Sangha has pressed nun so-and-so to stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.48_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.49_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.50_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.51_0: When the last announcement is finished, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she does not stop, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.2_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she does not stop, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.3_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she does not stop, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.4_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.5_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but they are unsure of it, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.6_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.3.2_0: if she has not been pressed;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.3.6_0: The sixth training rule is finished.
